com.sand.count21.logiikka

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sand.count21.logiikka.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    This class provides the main logic to the blackjack game. The class owns a player, dealer and a deck.

      • Game

        public Game()
        Constructor for the game. It initializes a deck and shuffles it.

    • Method Detail

      • firstCardsInRound

        public void firstCardsInRound()
        This method is used in the beginning of every blackjack round. It deals two cards to player and dealer.

      • shouldIshuffleDeck

        public boolean shouldIshuffleDeck()
        The method checks that there is still cards in the deck.
        Returns:
        true if there is no card left in deck, otherwise false

      • shuffleDeck

        public void shuffleDeck()
        The method shuffles the deck in the game.

      • dealTo

        public void dealTo(Player player,
                   int n)
        The method deals cards to the player provided to the method.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that will receive cards from deck
        n - how many cards will the player receive

      • checkIfDealerMustHit

        public boolean checkIfDealerMustHit(Player dealer)
        The dealer will need to hit if the sum of the cards are less than 17 (Ace value = 1). The dealer will hit if value of hand with ace 11 is higher than 21 but the value with ace = 1 is lower than 17. The dealer will stop if
        Parameters:
        dealer - The dealer checked
        Returns:
        True if dealer must hit

      • checkForBlackjack

        public boolean checkForBlackjack(Player player)
        This method checks if the player has blackjack.
        Parameters:
        player - the player the method checks
        Returns:
        true if the player has blackjack

      • checkIfBust

        public boolean checkIfBust(Player player)
        This method checks if the value of the hand of the player is more than 21.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that is checked
        Returns:
        true if the value is over 21

      • checkIfSumIs21

        public boolean checkIfSumIs21(Player player)
        This method checks if the value of the hand the player got is exactly 21.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that is checked
        Returns:
        true if the value is 21

      • checkIfPlayerCanSplit

        public boolean checkIfPlayerCanSplit(Player player)
        This method checks if the player can split. If the player has two cards that has equal value then the player can split. Face cards are all valued as 10.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is checked
        Returns:
        returns true if the player can split

      • everyOneFolds

        public void everyOneFolds()
        This method folds the cards of the player and dealer so they are ready for the next round.

      • didPlayerWin

        public boolean didPlayerWin()
        This method checks if the player won.
        Returns:
        true if player won

      • blackjackRoundDone

        public void blackjackRoundDone()
        This method is used when the round is done. It uses the method didPlayerWin() and adds to the players game count. It also tells betmanager to pay bet if the player won.

      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame()
        This method zeros the counter and sets the bet and player money for a new game.

      • startNewRound

        public void startNewRound()
        This method initializes the game for a new round.
